15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <string.h>
20
21#include <isc/mem.h>
22#include <isc/random.h>
23#include <isc/pool.h>
24#include <isc/util.h>
25
26/***
27 *** Types.
28 ***/
29
30struct isc_pool {
31 isc_mem_t * mctx;
32 unsigned int count;
33 isc_pooldeallocator_t free;
34 isc_poolinitializer_t init;
35 void * initarg;
36 void ** pool;
37};
38
39/***
40 *** Functions.
41 ***/
42
43static isc_result_t
44alloc_pool(isc_mem_t *mctx, unsigned int count, isc_pool_t **poolp) {
45 isc_pool_t *pool;
46
47 pool = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*pool));
48 if (pool == NULL)
49 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
50 pool->count = count;
51 pool->free = NULL;
52 pool->init = NULL;
53 pool->initarg = NULL;
54 pool->mctx = NULL;
55 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &pool->mctx);
56 pool->pool = isc_mem_get(mctx, count * sizeof(void *));
57 if (pool->pool == NULL) {
58 isc_mem_put(mctx, pool, sizeof(*pool));
59 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
60 }
61 memset(pool->pool, 0, count * sizeof(void *));
62
63 *poolp = pool;
64 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
65}
66
67isc_result_t
68isc_pool_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, unsigned int count,
69 isc_pooldeallocator_t release,
70 isc_poolinitializer_t init, void *initarg,
71 isc_pool_t **poolp)
72{
73 isc_pool_t *pool = NULL;
74 isc_result_t result;
75 unsigned int i;
76
77 INSIST(count > 0);
78
79 /* Allocate the pool structure */
80 result = alloc_pool(mctx, count, &pool);
81 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
82 return (result);
83
84 pool->free = release;
85 pool->init = init;
86 pool->initarg = initarg;
87
88 /* Populate the pool */
89 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
90 result = init(&pool->pool[i], initarg);
91 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
92 isc_pool_destroy(&pool);
93 return (result);
94 }
95 }
96
97 *poolp = pool;
98 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
99}
100
101void *
102isc_pool_get(isc_pool_t *pool) {
103 return (pool->pool[isc_random_uniform(pool->count)]);
104}
105
106int
107isc_pool_count(isc_pool_t *pool) {
108 REQUIRE(pool != NULL);
109 return (pool->count);
110}
111
112isc_result_t
113isc_pool_expand(isc_pool_t **sourcep, unsigned int count,
114 isc_pool_t **targetp)
115{
116 isc_result_t result;
117 isc_pool_t *pool;
118
119 REQUIRE(sourcep != NULL && *sourcep != NULL);
120 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
121
122 pool = *sourcep;
123 if (count > pool->count) {
124 isc_pool_t *newpool = NULL;
125 unsigned int i;
126
127 /* Allocate a new pool structure */
128 result = alloc_pool(pool->mctx, count, &newpool);
129 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
130 return (result);
131
132 newpool->free = pool->free;
133 newpool->init = pool->init;
134 newpool->initarg = pool->initarg;
135
136 /* Populate the new entries */
137 for (i = pool->count; i < count; i++) {
138 result = newpool->init(&newpool->pool[i],
139 newpool->initarg);
140 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
141 isc_pool_destroy(&newpool);
142 return (result);
143 }
144 }
145
146 /* Copy over the objects from the old pool */
147 for (i = 0; i < pool->count; i++) {
148 newpool->pool[i] = pool->pool[i];
149 pool->pool[i] = NULL;
150 }
151
152 isc_pool_destroy(&pool);
153 pool = newpool;
154 }
155
156 *sourcep = NULL;
157 *targetp = pool;
158 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
159}
160
161void
162isc_pool_destroy(isc_pool_t **poolp) {
163 unsigned int i;
164 isc_pool_t *pool = *poolp;
165 for (i = 0; i < pool->count; i++) {
166 if (pool->free != NULL && pool->pool[i] != NULL)
167 pool->free(&pool->pool[i]);
168 }
169 isc_mem_put(pool->mctx, pool->pool, pool->count * sizeof(void *));
170 isc_mem_putanddetach(&pool->mctx, pool, sizeof(*pool));
171 *poolp = NULL;
172}
